testsuite.name: successful login users
testsuite.system-out: |-- Given I want to go to the login page of advantage demo |---- Mao opens the browser at https://www.advantageonlineshopping.com/#/ |-- When I enter the information to login a user |---- Mao login user |------ Mao waiting |-------- Mao should see Ingresar al menu de usuario that is displayed |------ Mao waiting |-------- Mao should see Ingresar al menu de usuario that is displayed |------ Mao clicks on Ingresar al menu de usuario |------ Mao enters 'Maoruizh5333' into Nombre de usuario |------ Mao enters 'Aa$123456789' into Ingresar contrasena |------ Mao clicks on Ingresar |---- Mao buy products |------ Mao clicks on Seleccionar la categoria de laptops |------ Mao clicks on Seleccionar una laptop de hewlett packard |------ Mao clicks on Cambiar a color gris |------ Mao clicks on Clic en el campo cantidad |------ Mao enters '4' into Cambiar la cantidad |------ Mao clicks on Adicionar al carro de compras |------ Mao clicks on Abrir el menu del carro de compras |------ Mao clicks on Cinfirmar la compra |------ Mao clicks on Boton siguiente |------ Mao clicks on Marcar la tarjeta de credito |-- Then I validate the correct user login |---- Then validate login message |---- Then validate buy message
